dx.text: Top plane of the frame must deform more than 0.001 in the x-direction

dy.text: Top plane of the frame must deform more than 0.005 in the y-direction

Dx.text: The print nozzle must have at least 8 in of travel in the x-direction

Dy.text: The print nozzle must have at least 8 in of travel in the y-direction

v.text: The print nozzle must be capable of travelling 16 in/s or greater

res.text: The print nozzle must be capable of achieving a resolution of 0.001 in or less
